dialog.text: Hey, have you seen Jeff today?

He was supposed to be helping me out with this bug.  In the end I had to grovel to Tanya for help - so embarrassing.  She did help me but not without being totally sarcastic - the way she talks to me you would think I was about 5!  You done much this week?
You must be starting to make some really good progress.  Pete and I are going out this weekend as I have the weekend off.  Movie and pizza - such romance!  Have a great weekend!
